summary: "Duga mraèna noæ" is a story about Croatian partisans fight Hitler's troops during WWII.
cast: Goran Visnjic|Mustafa Nadarevic|Ivo Gregurevic|Goran Navojec|Boris Dvornik|Tarik Filipovic|Katarina Bistrovic-Darvas|Zarko Potocnjak|Vera Zima|Alen Liveric|Goran Grgic|Kresimir Mikic|Matko Raguz|Vili Matula|Minja Jovicic|Boris Svrtan|Ivan Brkic|Rene Bitorajac|Bozidar Alic|Inge Appelt|Ines Bojanic|Drazen Bratulic|Mirela Brekalo|Filip Filkovic|Asja Jovanovic|Marija Kohn|Adam Koncic|Vinko Kraljevic|Otokar Levaj|Dora Lipovcan|Danko Ljustina|Damir Loncar|Goran Malus|Suzana Nikolic|Bernarda Oman|Mate Picukaric|Marinko Prga|Filip Rados|Martin Sagner|Doris Saric-Kukuljica|Gita Serman-Kopljar|Davor Svedruzic|Antun ml. Vrdoljak|Matija Vrdoljak|Predrag 'Predjo' Vusovic
title: Duga mracna noc
